typeDescription.name: gov.nih.cc.rmd.framework.Annotation
typeDescription.description: A generic annotation with default attributes in it

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: An Identifier of who/what made this annoation.

featureDescription.name: fromSection
featureDescription.description: What section (type) did this come from? If we had better readers and writers this would be a pointer to the sectionZone, but making pointers to other annotatons turns out to be problematic with uima persistance (xmi) output.
